name: Chamonix Town Center
description: Main town square with shops, restaurants, and tourist information

name: Mer de Glace
description: Famous glacier accessible by train, with ice cave and museum

name: Bossons Glacier
description: Impressive glacier descending from Mont Blanc

name: Argentière
description: Traditional mountain village, gateway to Grands Montets

name: Mont Blanc Tunnel
description: Tunnel connecting France to Italy under Mont Blanc

description: Main railway station connecting to Geneva and beyond

description: Cable car to the iconic Aiguille du Midi peak

name: Brévent Cable Car
description: Cable car to Brévent with stunning valley views

name: Chamonix Church
description: Historic church in the town center
